abstract: Target is upping its social media marketing, especially on Facebook.
snippet: Target is upping its social media marketing, especially on Facebook.
lead_paragraph: The push by retailers into social media continues, with some even bringing out Version 2.0 or 2.5 of their presences on Web sites like Facebook, Twitter or YouTube. Case in point, Target, which has introduced an application on its Facebook page for its Merona line of clothing.

headline.main: Target Wants You To Friend Their Sweaters
